name: LG Certification
description:
LG Specific tests that need to be executed before submitting an app to LG

1/24/24: 
■ Notes 

＊ Test Results: All test items of the Self Checklist (LG Certification) must have either a "Pass" or "N/A" result before submitting the app to the Seller Lounge. 
    - If an item is marked as "Pass" when its result is supposed to be "N/A" and/or if an item is marked as "N/A" when its result is supposed to be "Pass", 
      the app can be rejected for not providing accurate information. 
    - In case there is an item marked as "Fail", the app must be submitted post debugging.

＊  All apps submitted to the Seller Lounge must go through a Quality Assurance (QA) process to be approved for sale.
      Modifying and/or updating apps currently on sale without going through another QA process can result in the removal of those apps from sale without notice.
